Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

Allow extra travel time.
